about_the_game:
Yo!
With this optional DLC, we're giving Kairos'Light fans the chance to rediscover the original version of the game, our first video game project, the one we cut our teeth on: Kairos'Light Vanilla.



Rediscover the feeling of wandering through the city of Thésye, only less pretty and full of bugs! Enjoy Edmond's presence, but with a weird walking animation that makes him lame. Chat with the townspeople, and remember how untalented we are at writing dialogue.
When you've done all that, uninstall the DLC and go back to playing the current version on Steam, like a nice hot bath after a long, tiring, cold hike.

All in all, “the Vanilla version of Kairos'Light is brilliant because of its harmonious blend of emotional storytelling, immersive gameplay mechanics, and charming aesthetics. These combined elements offer players a rich and memorable experience.” according to Chat GPT 3.5

What more do you need to get started? Success ?
That's a good thing, because we've taken the opportunity to add several more! ... That is, if it works, because the old version's engine is no longer up to date, so we're not 100% sure it will!

Have a great adventure!
